titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress on future United States assistance to Pakistan.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

bill.summary: 7/30/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress: (1) supporting the President's efforts to gain Pakistan's compliance with its past commitments not to produce weapon-grade nuclear materials; (2) calling on Pakistan to halt any illegal procurement activities by Pakistan in the United States; and (3) urging the President to inform Pakistan that its failure to comply with such past commitments jeopardizes any further U.S. military assistance.
